description: Alibaba is a rather arrogant Rook. He strongly believes rank doesn`t symbolize strength, and thinks his is on par with the Knights. Alibaba is largely Arabian themed.Alibaba first appears during the 3rd Round of the War Games. He is the first to go up when Alan wants to go first, claiming the other Chess Pieces there are too weak to fight him and that victory will make him a Knight.
name: Alibaba
